mapper.sql: country_id, country_name, local_country_name, country_code, country_code2, continent, region, surface_area, indep_year, population, life_expectancy, gnp, government_form, head_of_state, capital, time_zone, language_id, currency_id, date_modified, date_created

m_country.country_id as countryId,m_country.country_name as countryName,m_country.date_modified as dateModified,m_country.continent as continent, m_country.region as region,m_country.population as population,m_city.city_name as capitalCityName
mapper.select:
select
from m_country INNER JOIN m_city ON m_country.capital = m_city.city_id limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into m_country (country_id, country_name, local_country_name, country_code, country_code2, continent, region, surface_area, indep_year, population, life_expectancy, gnp, government_form, head_of_state, capital, time_zone, language_id, currency_id, date_modified, date_created) values (#{countryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{countryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{localCountryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countryCode2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{continent,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{surfaceArea,jdbcType=REAL}, #{indepYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{population,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lifeExpectancy,jdbcType=REAL}, #{gnp,jdbcType=REAL}, #{governmentForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headOfState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{capital,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{timeZone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{languageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currencyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dateModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dateCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

local_country_name = #{localCountryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country_code = #{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

surface_area = #{surfaceArea,jdbcType=REAL},
